attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Time and time again we hear of convicted criminals who either serve a proportion of their sentence or are shown leniency by our Judges. A 5 year sentence for example should mean 5 years, not half that. We all know victims of crime, and that it affects everyone. Overcrowding of our prisons is a problem, but also is letting these people out early. Lets set the deterrent now!

rejection.details: there are lots of petitions on this theme already
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
